answer: The bearish consensus on OpenAI suggests several significant challenges and vulnerabilities. Concerns include that OpenAI's long-term sustainability and enterprise value have been questioned, with some even arguing its valuation made no sense [8, 6]. Competitors such as Google are seen as strong contenders, with Microsoft reportedly believing it no longer needs OpenAI's technology as it possesses its own
